授業方法: This course meets once per week and will be conducted in English only. Students will study expectations of both correspondence and report writing for business purposes. Preparation before class—reading the textbook, doing practice activities, and doing writing tasks on computer and submitting them in a proper format—is essential. In class, there will be some lecture, pair work (particularly for peer review of writing), feedback, and limited writing time. Currently, this class is intended to be taught face-to-face; adjustments may be made in light of changing conditions and university policies.
